name: sleep (Tijn Arts)
description:
You are haunted by tall creatures, but to escape from this world you’ll have to sacrifice your powers…

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 43

my portfolio: https://www.tijnarts.com 

my Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/tijnarts

Troubleshooting

  • If anything stops working, try pausing and unpausing the game with "P"
  • If the pause menu doesn’t open, try opening and closing the inventory
  • If both won’t open… 🤷‍♂️

I will try to fix the bugs when I have the time ;)
